item.title: Ys: Memories of Celceta coming to Switch in spring 2025 in Japan
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/ys-memories-of-celceta-coming-to-switch-in-spring-2025-in-japan

  • Switch

Currently available for PlayStation 4, PC, and PS Vita.

Falcom will release a Switch version of Ys: Memories of Celceta in spring 2025 in Japan, the company announced.

Ys: Memories of Celceta is currently available for PlayStation 4, PC via Steam, and PS Vita.

Here is an overview of the PlayStation 4 version, via western publisher XSEED Games:

Delve into the unknown with Ys: Memories of Celceta, the classic action RPG offering from Nihon Falcom, remastered with gorgeous high-definition visuals for the PlayStation 4.

World-famous adventurer Adol Christin awakens in the unfamiliar land of Celceta, remembering nothing more than his own name. Confused and alone, he is approached by an information dealer named Duren who claims to know him and says that he was last seen wandering off into the nearby ‘sea of trees.’ Enlisted to chart the unmapped territories of Celceta, Adol hopes to regain his memories by exploring the great forest.

Originally released on the PS Vita, Ys: Memories of Celceta finally arrives on the PlayStation 4. Featuring enhanced graphics, exhilarating action RPG combat, and a complex tale of conspiracy, deception, and mystery, prepare to experience Adol’s greatest adventure yet!
